name: Planet Gold Rush
description:
Grab your gear and get mining, greenhorn, because in Planet Gold Rush you can WIN REAL FRICKIN’ GOLD*. And not just anyone’s gold... TODD HOFFMAN’S FRICKIN’ GOLD. Stake your claim, run your crew, and for a limited time, compete daily for your chance to win 1/8 ounce of real gold straight from Todd Hoffman’s personal reserves. Plus, every week, the best overall player wins an ounce of Todd’s gold.

Planet Gold Rush is the perfect combination of city building and gold mining! BUILD the ultimate gold mining operation with top-of-the-line equipment. EXPLORE the land for valuable resources to become the top gold miner the world has ever known. COMPETE in a variety of fun and challenging mini-games, including the opportunity to WIN real gold from Todd Hoffman through daily and weekly tournaments! Winners of the Todd Hoffman Challenge will also receive a Planet Gold Rush Limited Edition Prize Pack, be featured on the website, and get some epic bragging rights. So download and get mining for your chance to Win Todd’s Real Frickin’ Gold!

Feel the excitement of the gold rush:
- Compete daily in Todd’s Challenge to win real frickin’ gold
- Be the boss of your own gold mine
- Explore the vast frontiers of Planet Gold Rush
- Survey the land to find new dig sites and claim your fortune
- Play fun and immersive mini-games that bring the adventure of gold mining to life

This is more than just gold mining, this is an adventure – and it’s CHOCK full of FRICKIN’ GOLD! So what are you waiting for? There’s gold in them thar hills!

PLEASE NOTE! Planet Gold Rush is free to download and play. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device settings.

Under our Terms of Services and Privacy Policy, Planet Gold Rush is allowed for download and play only for persons 18 years or older.

Note: A network connection is required to play
